item.title: Reactive Lighting Installation
item.description: Two friends studying at Leeds College of Music had a module that required them to create a piece of music for an external creative project, exhibition, or show. Together we designed, built, and exhibited the project at Hyde Park Book Club (Leeds). The project consists of: A Processing application Arduino 300 WS2812B LEDs 100 2L Plastic Bottles The Processing application creates an audio input stream and sets the framerate to 100 FPS.
